channel.title: nextjs on Machine Code Never Lies
channel.description: Recent content in nextjs on Machine Code Never Lies

item.title: Migration to New Domain
item.description: What? Recently I’ve started playing with Next.js. I liked it so much I decided to rebuild my blog with it. It just so happens that I also was thinking about getting a new domain. The stars aligned and I’ve moved the blog to https://directedignorance.com. Come visit, perhaps you’ll like it. Why? Domain I’ve never really liked vilisimo.com. Nothing wrong with it, I just don’t really enjoy it all that much. “Directed ignorance”, on the other hand, reminds me of Discworld, one of my favorite book series.
